Element.question: How long has the patient had this condition?
Element.choices: 1-2 days,3-5 days,About a week,About 2 weeks,More than 2 weeks,More than 1 month,More than 1 year,Since birth

Element.question: Did the patient have this condition before?
Does anyone else in the family have this condition
Where was the first area the rash began?

Element.choices: All over,Arms,Back of the hands,Palms,Around fingers,Scalp,Face,Eyes,Mouth,Neck,Chest,Abdomen,Genital areas,Buttocks,Back,Legs,Feet

Element.question: How did it first start?
Element.choices: Bump,Pus bump,Flat white patch,Flat dark patch,Blister (water filled),Ulcer (open lesion),Red scaly,Brown scaly

Element.question: What are the symptoms?
Element.choices: Constant itching,Occasional itching,Itching all over,Constant pain,Burning bleeding,Fever
